attributes.action: Prevent the Royal Bank  of Scotland earmarking  £1.7B from the British Treasury for mortgages in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last week Rbs announced that they were earmarking £1.7B for mortgages in Scotland.  This is clearly a case of discrimination against the English who probably provided most of the funds to enable the British Treasury to rescue this and other banks
